Class EntityManager

java.lang.Object
  fsu.cs.alpha.EntityManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultiEntityManager, SingleEntityManager
public abstract class EntityManager
extends Object

Manages a list of entites and updates them etc.

collides

public static boolean collides(Entity a,
                               Entity b,
                               float error)
return whether two entities have collided - we use bounding box collision detection. error refers to the amount bounding boxes are allowed to overlap without triggerring a collision

Parameters:
a - first entity to test
b - second entity to test
error - the amount of error to allow for
Returns:
whether there was a collision
